title: Select a documentation issue
contents:
mode_edit

選擇一個文件問題link

Select a documentation issuelink

本主題介紹如何選擇要修復的 Angular 文件問題。

This topic describes how to select an Angular documentation issue to fix.

Angular 文件問題儲存在angular/angular儲存庫的問題選項卡中。文件問題可以透過 comp: docs 標籤來識別，並按優先順序標記。

Angular documentation issues are stored in the Issues tab of the angular/angular repo. Documentation issues can be identified by the area: docs label and they are labeled by priority.

歡迎你處理其他人尚未解決的任何問題。如果你知道文件中存在尚未報告的問題，你還可以建立一個新的文件問題。

You are welcome to work on any issue that someone else isn't already working on. If you know of a problem in the documentation that hasn't been reported, you can also create a new documentation issue.

選擇要解決的問題時要考慮的一些事項包括：

Some things to consider when choosing an issue to fix include:

  • 解決更高優先順序的問題對社群更有價值。

    Fixing higher priority issues is more valuable to the community.

  • 如果你是開源軟體的新手，優先順序較低的問題或 good first issue 將是一個很好的起點。

    If you're new to open source software, a lower priority issue or a good first issue would be a good place to start.

  • 每一項貢獻都有助於改進文件。

    Every contribution helps improve the documentation.

選擇要解決的問題後：

After you select an issue to resolve:

  1. 在問題頁面中，將 working on fix 新增為註釋，以讓其他人知道你正在處理它。

    In the issue page, add working on fix as a comment to let others know that you are working on it.

  2. 繼續到開始編輯文件主題。

    Continue to Starting to edit a documentation topic.

文件問題的連結Links to documentation issues
[所有開啟的文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22)[All open documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22)
[所有開啟和未分配的文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+no%3Aassignee+-label %3A"狀態%3A+有+PR")[All open and unassigned documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配好的第一個文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3A%22good+ first+issue%22+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned good first documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配的優先順序 1 文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap1+no% 3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned priority 1 documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap1+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配的優先順序 2 文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap2+no% 3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned priority 2 documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap2+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配的優先順序 3 文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap3+no% 3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned priority 3 documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap3+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配的優先順序 4 文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap4+no% 3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned priority 4 documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap4+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
[未分配的優先順序 5 文件問題](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap5+no% 3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")[Unassigned priority 5 documentation issues](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22area%3A+docs%22+label%3Ap5+no%3Aassignee+-label%3A"state%3A+has+PR")
